title: Track CAPA Effectiveness
description: A CAPA was implemented 3 months ago. A quality manager needs to check its effectiveness by reviewing recent data.

tasks.description: Retrieve the original CAPA record to understand the problem it was meant to solve.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the closed CAPA for reducing 'surface scratches'.

tasks.description: Analyze the production quality data for the last 3 months for the specific defect.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a trend chart showing the frequency of 'surface scratches' has decreased by 80%.

tasks.description: Log the effectiveness check in the CAPA record, confirming the action was successful, and close the monitoring task.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the CAPA record with the positive results and officially closes it.
